titles.title: National Task Force on the COVID-19 Pandemic Act
National Task Force on the COVID-19 Pandemic Act
A bill to establish the National Task Force on the Response of the United States to the COVID-19 Pandemic.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
National Task Force on the COVID-19 Pandemic Act
This bill establishes a legislative branch task force to investigate the facts and circumstances of the COVID-19 pandemic, including preparedness for and responses to the pandemic.
